text: Hey everyone! <https://www.workforimpact.com/|Work for Impact> is looking for a part-time fully remote HubSpot expert  to help us (we are newish to HubSpot) with the more with technical aspects of using HubSpot, for marketing B2B, data management, sales and service hubs, WFI has a fantastic team, lots of fun, if you are interested, please Dm me or email <mailto:geoff@workforimpact.com|geoff@workforimpact.com>
